programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Animal Antics With Joan Embery (4/25/86)
programme.desc: Frequent guest Joan Rivers discusses her autobiography, and Joan Embery brings a rare Albino Koala Bear.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '60s - Victor Buono (8/16/73)
programme.desc: Victor Buono drops in to talk about his recently released book of poetry, and to cut up with Johnny and Ed.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '70s - Burt Reynolds (11/5/86)
programme.desc: Burt Reynolds reflects on his 1973 Cosmo poster, and his five-year romance with actress Loni Anderson.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '50s - Bob Hope (1/16/81)
programme.desc: Bob Hope talks about the game, his early days, and entertaining presidents and his distinctive schnoz.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Sean Penn (10/9/86)
programme.desc: Sean Penn has a special message for his wife Madonna and Richard Pryor talks about his new Ferrari.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Animal Antics With Jim Fowler (1/22/88)
programme.desc: Jim Fowler, the host of “Mutual of Omaha’s Wild Kingdom,” brings an Indian Condor onto the show.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Athletes - Bob Uecker (2/12/85)
programme.desc: Bob Uecker talks about his New TV series Mr. Belvedere, collecting baseball cards, and more.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Ed Begley Jr. (2/23/84)
programme.desc: Ed Begley Jr. discusses starting out in the business. Suzanne Pleshette and Michael Davis also appear.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '90s - Courtney Cox (9/19/85)
programme.desc: Stars of two of the televisions biggest shows join Johnny--Ted Danson (Cheers) and Courtney Cox (Friends).

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '60s - Dean Martin (12/12/75)
programme.desc: Dean Martin recounts celebrating Frank Sinatra’s big 6-0. Also playing Vegas and frequent forays into casinos.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Michael Douglas (2/21/92)
programme.desc: What a star-studded show. Elizabeth Taylor and Michael Douglas join Johnny.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Best Of The Mighty Carson Art Players (5/8/87)
programme.desc: Paul Reiser talks about getting a sensitive body part stuck in an exercise machine.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '50s - Jerry Lewis (3/21/84)
programme.desc: Jerry Lewis jokes about scoring the French Legion of Honor Award and his recent heart surgery.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '60s - Walter Matthau (7/22/86)
programme.desc: We’re spelling tonight! Walter Matthau and Johnny quiz one another on difficult words.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '70s - Bruce Dern (3/30/77)
programme.desc: Oscar-winner Bruce Dern talks about getting his big break and his neighbor Robert Redford.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Talk Show Greats - Jay Leno (5/16/91)
programme.desc: Jay Leno describes his parents amazingly happy marriage and getting recognized in a New York City deli.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '80s - Chevy Chase (5/30/85)
programme.desc: To celebrate turning 40 Chevy Chase joins Johnny to talk about his new movie, Fletch.

programme.desc: Bob Uecker talks about his New TV series Mr. Belvedere, collecting baseball cards, and more.
